casebody.data:
Antwoin RICHMOND, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Drew ADAMS, Melissa Pine, and John Doe # 1, Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CT-833 Court of Appeals of Indiana. November 20, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ALTICE , J.

We reverse the dismissal and direct the trial court on remand to proceed under the amended complaint.

BROWN, J., Concurs.

TAVITAS, J., Concurs.
